betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Bears come in 4 different flavors, Black, Grizzly, Polar, and Panda and each interact in slightly different ways.

Black and Grizzly bears act like spiders in that they are neutral in light and hostile in darkness. Polar are always hostile, and Pandas are passive, even when hit. 

Bears will also attack farm mobs like cows, sheep, pigs and the like.

You can tame them by giving baby bears fish (raw or cooked), pandas eat sugar cane instead. Once fully grown they can be bred with any meat, note that like any Mo'Creatures mob the pair needs to be seperate from others of their species or they won't breed.

You can also ride tamed bears with a saddle and can mount a chest giving 18 slots. Do note that bears are quite slow compared to other mounts.
